description: Test fixture corpus for casr provider readers, writers, and round-trip tests.

cc_simple.intent: Basic 4-message conversation with all fields populated.

cc_complex.intent: Tool use/result content blocks, content arrays, file-history-snapshot skip.

cc_missing_workspace.intent: Session with no cwd field. Tests workspace=None path.

cc_unicode.intent: Japanese, Chinese, and emoji characters. Tests UTF-8 fidelity.

cc_malformed.intent: Malformed JSON lines interspersed with valid messages. Tests error tolerance.

codex_modern.intent: Modern JSONL envelope with session_meta, event_msg, response_item.

codex_legacy.intent: Legacy single-JSON format with session and items keys.

codex_token_count.intent: Includes token_count events that should be skipped as non-conversational.

codex_reasoning.intent: Agent reasoning events extracted as Assistant messages with author=reasoning.

codex_malformed.intent: Malformed lines interspersed with valid Codex entries. Tests error tolerance.

gmi_simple.intent: Basic Gemini session with user/model message types.

gmi_grounding.intent: Grounding metadata and citations in model responses. Tests extra field preservation.

gmi_missing_workspace.intent: No workspace inferrable from content. Tests workspace=None.

gmi_gemini_role.intent: Uses 'gemini' role type instead of 'model'. Tests normalize_role mapping.

edge_empty_content_cc.intent: Empty and whitespace-only content messages that should be skipped.

edge_null_timestamps_cc.intent: All messages lack timestamps. Tests None timestamp handling.

edge_long_message_cc.intent: Very long message body (900+ chars). Tests no-truncation preservation.

edge_single_sided_cc.intent: User-only messages, no assistant. Validation should flag as error.
